title: The Patched up fashion plate
brief_description: A girl (Linda Ingram) living in a battered timber house patches a pair of jeans. She walks among the second hand stores of Prahran and then the fashion boutiques of Toorak Road.
description: A girl (Linda Ingram) living in a battered timber house patches a pair of jeans. She walks among the second hand stores of Prahran and then the fashion boutiques of Toorak Road.
